sect1.title: Build CFLAGS
sect1.para: CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS must not be set during the building of cross-tools.
To disable CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS use the following commands:
Now add these to ~/.bashrc, just in case you have to exit and restart building later:

screen.userinput: cat >> ~/.bashrc << EOF unset CFLAGS unset CXXFLAGS EOF
